The Lost Husband is now a MOVIE starring Leslie Bibb & Josh Duhamel!

It hit #1 on Netflix in August 2020 and was one of their Top 25 movies of the year! It also hit the Top 10 in over 30 countries around the world in 2020!

Now her crazy Aunt Jean has offered Libby an escape: a job and a place to live on her farm in the Texas Hill Country. Before she can talk herself out of it, Libby is packing the minivan, grabbing the kids, and hitting the road.
